item.title: How i make via command like i want to tpy ::reset and it reset server help@
item.dc:creator: @Final_Dawn Final Dawn
item.description:
@Final_Dawn wrote:

Actually the old one is wrong but you can do any of these for it to check the playerRights

= 3
!= 0
== 3

or if you just want it to make it so only you can restart it then you can do…

&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YourUserNameGoesHERE”)

for instance…

if (command.startsWith(“commandname”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YourUserNameHERE”)) {

Read full topic

@xxx_code_this wrote:

add this into client.java import statements:

import java.lang.System;
import java.lang.Runtime;
import java.io.IOException;

add this void

public void lulOwned() throws IOException
{
Runtime load = Runtime.getRuntime();
// getRuntime() method is a static method which is used to
// obtain access to an object of class Runtime.
r.exec(“C:\windows\sourcename\resetart.exe”);
}

} else if(command.equals(“reset”) && playerRights < 3) {
lulOwned();
}
